name: easy crochet bucket hat
sizes_available: baby, toddler, child, adult s, adult m, adult l, adult xl
notes:
stay cool this summer with an easy crochet bucket hat! this easy-to-follow pattern uses basic stitches and cotton yarn to create a breathable bucket hat perfect for sunny days.

**sizes**

baby (toddler, child, adult s, adult m, adult l, adult xl)

head circumference: 17.5 (19, 20.5, 22, 23, 24.5, 26”) / 44.5 (48.5, 52, 56, 58.5, 62, 66cm)

here’s why i love this pattern:

* easy: it’s a great project for
  beginners – and i’ll walk you through
  every step of the process.
* seamless: this hat is worked in the
  round. 
* lots of sizes from baby to adult xl,
  so you can make bucket hats for the
  whole family.
* customizable: keep it simple with a
  solid color, or mix it up with
  stripes, color blocking, or even a
  checkerboard pattern.
